text:
Hello,

This is the second time (known to me, thanks to enthusiast clients) this error has occurred at client's end while making the purchase for my theme. I've already complaint about it a month ago and feedback I received was that the issue was fixed.

But it seems not.

Can anyone from HubSpot connect with me and sort this out?

I might have lost more than these two purchase events. :disappointed:
HI Pawan, I believe themes payments are handled by the theme developer - So i imagine itâ€™s them you need to reach out to.. I could be wrong here!
Hi <@UQERM7BLY>, no it's not that issue. Payment of the marketplace is handled from the HubSpot side. I've already reported it twice.
